column1: From invading the privacy of American citizens to releasing COVID-19 on the world we cannot allow China to continue with their crimes. Add your name below and hold China accountable: https://t.co/8cHFuzPet1

From their role in the spread of COVID-19 to their criminal invasions of privacy through popular apps China must be held accountable for their actions. ADD YOUR NAME IF YOU AGREE.  https://t.co/8cHFuzPet1

Nancy Pelosi continues to sneak unrelated spending into the next COVID relief package. Republican goals remain the same. Your health and safety getting our children back to school safely increasing testing and protecting our small businesses. Watch my interview on @FoxNews: https://t.co/cgF82eqze0

While we’re all focused on the threat of COVID it’s important to ensure our armed forces are prepared to face national security threats at home & abroad. I’m fighting to ensure they have the resources but they also need your support -- add your name.  https://t.co/3oB5LQENcc

Nancy Pelosi’s $3T wishlist is absurd & does nothing to help Americans. In the next round of coronavirus relief my priorities are getting people back to work & children back to schools continued focus on saving lives & liability protections for healthcare providers & businesses https://t.co/z2TIyGV3Uu

As America recovers from this pandemic it’s important we keep the pressure on China for their role in spreading and mishandling the coronavirus. ADD YOUR NAME to help me hold China accountable!  https://t.co/8cHFuzPet1

China’s role in covering up the spread of coronavirus is just the latest in a long history of being a bad actor. The Communist Party of China cannot go unchecked -- will you add your name to join our cause to hold China accountable?  https://t.co/zfNI8m1ij2

Today on #NationalNursesDay take a moment to thank our nurses in schools hospitals and clinics across Wyoming. They are on the frontlines helping to combat COVID-19 and keep us safe. Thank you. https://t.co/g2NKpC3sZ9
China must be held accountable for their role in the mismanagement and spread of the coronavirus not only in the U.S. but around the world. https://t.co/GwHDEWMcwE
Do you have questions about - Coronavirus symptoms - What to do if you’re sick - Guidelines  Check out the Centers for Disease Control website for the latest: https://t.co/yVLhruQKcN
Stay home if possible. Do your part to help stop the spread of the virus:  ✅Maintain 6 ft of social distance if you do go out ✅Cover sneezes & coughs ✅Wash your hands

Make sure you’re checking the Wyoming Department of Health’s dedicated coronavirus site for the latest updates on cases in our state and resources on who to contact for questions ➡️ https://t.co/kyopkBjTZC

As a doctor I can tell you that @realDonaldTrump is right. America is the most prepared nation in the world to face #coronavirus. Our President was right to put in effect travel restrictions and more may be necessary as the virus spreads. America must remain vigilant. https://t.co/mCBfI7f51T
